[{"from": "inoventr 1 <inoventr9@gmail.com>", "to": "sumeetdc.work@gmail.com", "subject": "Job Application Acknowledgment", "date": "Thu, 21 Aug 2025 13:43:45 +0530", "body": "*Subject:* Application Received – Data Analyst Role

Dear Sumeet,

Thank you for submitting your application for the *Data Analyst* position
at *TechNova Solutions*. Our recruitment team is currently reviewing
applications, and shortlisted candidates will be contacted for the next
round of interviews.

We appreciate the time you invested in applying and will keep you updated
on the status of your application.

Best regards,
HR Team
TechNova Solutions
", "id": "198cbb11bcc66be6"}, {"from": "Unstop Insights <noreply@dare2compete.news>", "to": "sumeetdc.work@gmail.com", "subject": "Sumeet , SBI will help you beat the job market blues—5000+ fresh openings!", "date": "Sat, 16 Aug 2025 13:22:36 +0530", "body": "Base CTC up to INR 7.73 LPA  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏ SBI | 5000+ Openings Hi Sumeet, You’ve gotten your degree, but the job market is tough. Are you scrolling through job listings on repeat, but to no avail? This ENDS NOW! SBI (State Bank of India) has 5000+ openings across customer support and sales domains, and you’ll fit right in. - Who can apply: Freshers and passouts in any discipline - Basic Pay: Up to INR 7.73 LPA - Benefits: PF, NPS, Medical, Leave-Fare, and other allowances - Application: Online Apply Now Hakuna Matata, Team Unstop If you'd like to unsubscribe and stop receiving these emails click here", "id": "198b1ddc3c2fcaf4"}, {"from": "Recruiting BairesDev <Recruiting@notifications.bairesdev.com>", "to": "sumeetdc.work@gmail.com", "subject": "BairesDev | Confirm your registration and move forward with your job application!", "date": "Thu, 14 Aug 2025 07:23:28 +0000", "body": "Hi Sumeet, We are happy to have you with us! Please confirm your email address to complete your registration to our Applicants Site. Please click this link to confirm your registration and move forward. If you have any questions or require assistance, please contact us through Live Chat or email us at recruiting.process@bairesdev.com . Our Talent Support team will be happy to help you. All the best, Talent Acquisition Team BairesDev®", "id": "198a7765f74d4031"}, {"from": "IBM Talent Acquisition <talent@ibm.com>", "to": "sumeetdc.work@gmail.com", "subject": "You have successfully submitted your IBM job application - 51021 - Frontend Developer", "date": "Tue, 12 Aug 2025 11:27:59 +0000", "body": "IBM Careers       

   	 IBM Careers  	 [1]     

     Dear Sumeet, thank you for applying to the role of 51021 - Frontend Developer with person ID - 9952901 at IBM. We’re excited that you’re considering us as your next employer!

 Here at IBM, we believe our greatest asset is the IBMer. We strive every day to foster a culture of conscious inclusion for all individuals and provide IBMers the opportunity to make a positive impact on the world while bringing their authentic selves to work.

 To that end, we want to be as transparent as possible with you about what to expect next now that you’ve applied to IBM. Currently, your application is being reviewed by real IBMers, who are experts in screening resumes in their respective fields. If there's a potential match, we’ll contact you to discuss the next steps of our hiring process.

 While you wait to hear from us:

 • Visit our special careers page to find tips on acing your interview and career advice from current IBMers. You can also check out our application process page to learn more about how we hire at IBM.

 • Connect with us on our Life@IBM social media channels (links in the footer below) where you can engage with us further, discover what life at IBM is like, and see how IBMers around the world are making an impact.

 You can also check the status of your application at any time by visiting your [2] IBM Career Portal . If you have any questions, please feel free to send us a direct message on any of our social channels.

 Thank you again, Sumeet, for taking the time to apply to IBM and for your interest in becoming a future IBMer.

 Best regards,
 IBM Talent Acquisition Team   

 Did a friend forward this to you? You can subscribe [3] here.   

  	 [4]     	 [5]     	 [6]     	 [7]     	 [8]     	 [9]     
  	 [10]  ibm.com/careers   

© IBM Corporation 2023. IBM, the IBM logo, IBM Cloud™ and [11] ibm.com are trademarks of the International Business Machines Corp., registered in many jurisdictions worldwide. This document is current as of the initial date of publication and may be changed by IBM at any time. Not all offerings are available in every country in which IBM operates.  
  	 To ensure delivery to your inbox, please add [12] talent@ibm.com to your address book. Please do not reply to this email, as we are unable to respond from this address.  
  	 If you’d like us to refrain from sending your similar e-mails in the future, please click on the unsubscribe link below. You may also mail a written request to IBM US at: IBM Corporation, 11501 Burnet Rd, Bldg 904 3B-000, Austin, TX 78758.  
  	 [13] © IBM | Data Privacy Policy

", "id": "1989df3706960c03"}, {"from": "Unstop Insights <noreply@dare2compete.news>", "to": "sumeetdc.work@gmail.com", "subject": "Sumeet, job-hunting feels like going down the rabbit hole?", "date": "Sat, 02 Aug 2025 13:12:45 +0530", "body": "230 EPFO roles | CTC up to INR 21 LPA  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏  ﻿ ͏ UPSC EPFO Recruitment 2025 | Unstop Hi Sumeet, Are you spiraling down the job hunt rabbit hole, worrying about finding (and then landing) the right job? First, you’re NOT alone. Second, we’ve got a way out for YOU: UPSC EPFO Recruitment 2025 is now live with 230 officer-level positions —open for all disciplines (including yours). Eligibility: Bachelor's Degree in any subject from a recognized university Experience: None needed CTC range: INR 18 to 21 LPA Deadline: August 18, 2025 Apply Now This might be the shot you were waiting for. All the best, Team Unstop If you'd like to unsubscribe and stop receiving these emails click here", "id": "19869bbb212ac5a7"}, {"from": "Hireclap Careers <careers@hireclap.com>", "to": "sumeetdc.work@gmail.com", "subject": "Job Alert: Complete Your Online Assessment", "date": "Tue, 29 Jul 2025 09:25:41 +0000", "body": "Hire Test/title> Start your journey to a IT career with HireTest Dear Sumeet Choudhary, Looking to get noticed and land better job offers? Start by taking a free online assessment on HireTests.com – a platform trusted by top recruiters. All India Ranking – Know where you stand among others Seen by Employers – Your scores can be shared with hiring companies Real Hiring Questions – Practice what companies usually ask Top Companies Hire Here – Infosys, Capgemini, TCS, Cognizant, Wipro & more Totally Free – No hidden charges at any step The assessments cover: Aptitude | Reasoning | Logical Ability | Verbal Skills and more. Eligibility Criteria: Freshers/Experienced Apply Here You are receiving this email because you have previously shown interest in similar opportunities and match your education, experience, preferred job type, etc. Unsubscribe www.hireclap.com HSR Layout, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560102, India", "id": "198558080379b9db"}, {"from": "foundit <updates@alerts.foundit.in>", "to": "sumeetdc.work@gmail.com", "subject": "Your profile is not yet ready for a job search, sumeet choudhary", "date": "Mon, 28 Jul 2025 11:22:59 +0000 (UTC)", "body": "Profile Reminder Get recruiters' attention! Hi sumeet choudhary, Update your job details now to get exciting job opportunities. Update Profile If you'd like to unsubscribe and stop receiving these emails click here .", "id": "19850c58bb9a5b60"}]
summary: The Portia Google Search Email Tool was used with the query `(subject:job OR subject:recruiter OR body:job OR body:recruiter) after:2025/07/25` to search Gmail for emails containing "job" or "recruiter" in the subject or body within the last 30 days.  The tool returned a list of 10 emails from various senders (including recruiters and job sites) with details such as sender, recipient, subject, date, body, and email ID.  The email content includes job application acknowledgments, job alerts, and recruitment opportunities.  Due to the length of the email content, a full summary is not provided.
